name: wake up mr white

name: Greetings!
description: Good work! Those new suits can be tricky. Please proceed to the next area. All right, Gordon, your suit should keep you comfortable through all this. The specimen will be delivered to you in a few moments. If you would be so good as to climb up and start the rotors, we can bring the Anti-Mass Spectrometer to eighty percent and hold it there until the carrier arrives.
